data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I would like to remind you that I applied for this namespace month
    ago, what is the status?

    Also, some testers work on outdated versions of my module and what
    is with DBI::Simple, a nono anyways and this one gets the credit of
    earlier distributions with those only sharing the name?

    Where is Perl going?

    Regards Alexander David
